body.name: Smart Watch Men Women New Upgraded 2.2 inch NFC, Fitness Tracker More Sports Modes Heart Rate Sleep & Customizable Dials, IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone & Android (Orange-1)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 9 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
features: ✔️【HD Bluetooth Smartwatch】HD screen smartwatch, only need Bluetooth connection, you can easily make phone calls, music playback, message reading, contact storage and call history view on your watch. No matter where you are, you will never miss an important call or message.

✔️【50Meter Deep Waterproof, Rugged Screen】Waterproof up to 50 meters deep, you can wear it while swimming. High sensitivity HD color large screen, easy to operate and clear display.70 stylish watch interfaces for your choice. You can also customize the watch interface with your own photos.

✔️【Men's and Women's Fitness Watch】 - If you have an energetic lifestyle and want to perfect your workouts, or if you're new to working out and want to be active, then this smartwatch is the perfect choice to keep you motivated and healthy. Automatically tracks your steps, calories, heart rate, sleep stages throughout the day. Large capacity, low power battery provides longer life, supporting up to 10 days of use and 35 days of standby time.

✔️【All-Weather Fitness Tracking Watch】 This smart fitness tracking watch records your daily activities such as heart rate, blood oxygen level, stress, calories burned, scientific sleep, and even has a female menstrual cycle tracking function. It has 20 different exercise modes to record all your movements and body conditions during exercise and can generate a view of your exercise data.

✔️【Satisfied Service and Perfect Gift】-This will be a smooth purchase. If you receive the product with any quality problem, dissatisfaction or damage, please contact us and we will replace it for free or refund 100% unconditionally. This smartwatch is affordable and makes a great gift for friends and family to help them stay active and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This watch is great for a kid !
reviews.reviewText: My son wanted a smart watch so bad, I got this one to see if he liked it and he loved it, plays games on it and it’s really easy to use. The watch face Is large and easy to see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Children love it very much
reviews.reviewText: The watch has a high appearance value, is also very comfortable to wear, has accurate positioning, clear call sound quality, supports high-definition video calls, and many other functions are good, which children love very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pretty good watch
reviews.reviewText: The watch is quite good. The video call quality is not noisy, the touch screen sensitivity is high, the video signal is stable, and the strap is very soft, making it comfortable to wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and cute
reviews.reviewText: This watch is so fun and reasonably priced. It works great so far and easy to understand how to work it. I was able to get my phone and contacts downloaded easily. I haven't used all of the features yet, but I think it was a good buy.Never thought about getting a smartwatch. Never thought it was worth it. Boy was I wrong. I love all the different things you can do with this smartwatch. Using Alexa, text messages, and much more. I love this smartwatch.
